attributes.action: Stop covid passports which cause discrimination against social choices
attributes.additional_details: Allow people who have t been vaccinated to have the same choices as everyone else
attributes.background: Stop discriminating against people who don’t want a covid jab

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
